# Common file patterns to exclude from analysis

# Build and output directories
bin/*
obj/*
out/*
publish/*
dist/*
build/*

# Generated files
*.designer.cs
*.g.cs
*.g.i.cs
*AssemblyInfo.cs
*.Designer.cs
GlobalAssemblyInfo.cs

# Package management
packages/*
node_modules/*
.nuget/*

# IDE and editor files
.vs/*
.vscode/*
.idea/*
*.swp
*.swo
*~

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
.DS_Store?
._*
.Spotlight-V100
.Trashes
ehthumbs.db
Thumbs.db

# Log files
*.log
logs/*

# Temporary files
*.tmp
*.temp
temp/*

# Documentation generation
_site/*
.jekyll-cache/*

# Database files
*.db
*.sqlite
*.sqlite3

# Compiled libraries
*.dll
*.so
*.dylib

# Archives
*.zip
*.tar.gz
*.rar
*.7z
